import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; import Comments from './comments'; import widgetdata from '../../data/widgetdata.json'; class AolmailComputer extends Component { render() { let imgattr = 'image' let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/' return (
NEWS
  • 28 JANUARY, 2020
  • BY ADMIN

How To Download Aol Mail To Computer

About AOL Mail

AOL Mail is an online email service provider owned by Verizon and created under AOL Inc. AOL started providing emailing services in 1993 and has been offering featureful services since then. By 1997 it became the biggest email service provider in the world, with 9 million subscribers. Down the line, it introduced many extensions to its mailing service, with the biggest change being the introduction of free mail. In 2017, Verizon, the owner of Aol, introduced a separate platform for emails and named it AOL Mail. Before this, all email services were provided in-house. Now AOL Mail is available to download on mobile devices and computers. They have introduced AOL Mobile App for mobile devices. For computers, AOL Mail Desktop and AOL Mail Desktop Gold. Before downloading it on your computer, it is necessary to know all the details about AOL Mail. Keep reading to learn more about downloading Aol mail on your computer.

AOL Mail App Features

Enjoy lightning-fast loading times for AOL Mail, along with today's headlines and popular videos, on the mobile device of your choice. You can control all your device and AOL contacts from a single location and receive quick push notifications whenever there is breaking news or a new email. It's like having the most of AOL in your pocket.

Tracking Your Packages

A new "Packages" tab that details your forthcoming and past deliveries is now available, making it easier than ever to monitor your packages. You no longer need to use a variety of applications only to keep track of your deliveries.

New Filters

At the very top of your inbox, you may sort your messages according to attachments, favourites, unread messages, people, and travel.

Free Trial Reminders

You'll be able to quickly view an inventory of all the free trials you've signed up for and Aol mail login get notifications in advance of the expiration of those trials.

Unsubscribe Suggestions

Regain control of your inbox by reading these tips on how to stop receiving emails from Gift Card Management: Don't let another gift card slip your mind. We maintain track of the balances on gift cards, ensuring you do not miss out on any opportunities to receive free money.

Download AOL Mail on Mobile Devices

AOL Mobile is focused entirely on providing you with the most enjoyable experience possible when browsing on a small screen. It reconstructs AOLwebpages specifically for mobile devices like phones and tablets so that you won't have to strain your eyes or scroll aimlessly when reading articles or seeing photographs and videos on your device. In addition, it extensively uses the touch screen on your device to ensure that your time with AOL Mobile is filled with delightful taps and swipes. To download AOL Mobile follow the steps below:

Download from Official Website
  • Visit the AOL Mail software webpage https://discover.aol.com/software
  • Click on the AOL Mobile Section.
  • Proceed by clicking on Get Started.
  • You will be taken to your respected app store, where you can install AOL Mobile on your device.
Download from the App Store
  • Open your App Store on your mobile device.
  • Click on the search bar or search icon.
  • Search for AOL: News Email Weather Video app.
  • Click on Install.
  • If you use an iPhone, enter your credentials to download the application
  • Click Open and start by signing in or signing up.

System Requirements for Mobile Devices For Android

As of Jan 2023, The download size of the aol mail login support for Android is 25 MB, and the minimum Android Version is 9+.

For iPhone

The download size is 245 MB, and the minimum OS requirement is as below:

  • iPhone: iOS 14.0 or later.
  • iPad: iPadOS 14.0 or later
  • iPod touch: iOS 14.0 or later.
Download AOL Mail on Computer

You can access AOL mail by visiting https://mail.aol.com/ on your computer. AOL also allows users to download AOL Mail on their computers. Follow the below steps to download AOL Mail on your computer:

  • You can get a free trial of AOL Desktop Gold by going to the Software & Downloads section and selecting the aol desktop gold for Windows option. Click the Get Started button beneath the aol desktop gold download heading to download the AOL Mail Application for Computer.
  • After the download is complete, you can launch the installation process for the AOL software on your Windows computer by double-clicking the Install AOL Desktop.exe file.
  • Signing into your AOL account and navigating to the My Services | Subscriptions section will allow you to manage your aol desktop gold download subscription if you have one.
  • Alternatively, if you are a member of the AOL Advantage Plan, you are entitled to a free copy of AOL Desktop Gold as part of your membership benefits. After logging into your MyBenefits page, navigate to the All Products section to locate the aol desktop gold option. Simply click the Download Now button to begin the quick and easy installation of AOL Mail on your computer.
System Requirements for AOL Mail Desktop
  • Windows 7, 8, or 10; a computer processor that is 266 MHz or faster.
  • If possible, a screen resolution of 1024 x 768 or higher.
  • If possible, a screen resolution of 1024 x 768 or higher.
  • 512 megabytes of free space on the hard disc.
  • An internet connection is required.
AOL Mail Desktop Features

AOL Mail desktop has several features that, when combined, make it easier to use, organise, and personalise your email. To round up your individualised e-mail experience, you can modify your AOL Mail account settings.

  • AOL Mail for computers is now only available as aol desktop gold download
  • AOL Desktop Gold is the user-friendly, all-in-one desktop you are familiar with and appreciate. It contains mail, surfing, search, and content, and it now features the following:
  • Premium security tools to assist in defending your AOL account against being broken into or otherwise compromised
  • Automatic Software updates allow you to save space and time on your system by automatically replacing older versions with newer ones as soon as they are available.
Conclusion

In this article, we have explained what AOL Mail is and laid out all the features of aol Mail download on mobile devices and computers. We have also explained how you can download AOL Mail on your mobile devices and computers with step-by-step instructions and system requirements. After reading the article, you can easily download AOL mail on any device. If you need any help regarding AOL Mail, you can contact us.
